subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Billy Hunter, the embattled executive director of the N.B.A. players union, said he plans to “to exercise all my options” following his suspension for improper business practices.
snippet: Billy Hunter, the embattled executive director of the N.B.A. players union, said he plans to “to exercise all my options” following his suspension for improper business practices.
